meanings.definition: To adapt for a new use or purpose.
meanings.sent1: She repurposes old jars as candle holders.
meanings.sent2: He repurposes old furniture to create unique pieces.
meanings.sent3: The clever inventor repurposes a broken umbrella into a makeshift tent.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity repurposes everyday objects into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The resourceful chef repurposes leftovers into delicious meals.

meanings.definition: The act of adapting something for a new use or purpose.
meanings.sent1: The repurposes of old materials can lead to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent2: His repurposes of technology have revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent3: The museum showcased the repurposes of historical artifacts in a new exhibit.
meanings.sent4: The repurposes of space in the small apartment amazed visitors.
meanings.sent5: The repurposes of old buildings into modern offices brought new life to the city.
